name: Billy's Revenge
description:
Hi all! This is my submission for Dani's Basement Jam #3!

If the game doesn't run on Chrome, try Edge or a different browser.

You're Billy and you had enough of Dani's teasing, shooting, and other shenanigans. Time for payback! Fly him to the moon and leave him there... (You cannot actually reach the moon in game)

All assets including scripts, objects, sounds, etc, will be available for free via my  Youtube channel. Enjoy the game :D

CONTROLS

Mouse Move left and right
